events.message: I received my order last week but I want to return it because the product is not what I expected and I would like a refund.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund due to mention of return and refund in their message.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for this customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so that I can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product does not match the description on the website and I do not want to keep it.
Thank you for the details. I have submitted your refund request and you will receive an email with return instructions shortly.
Thanks for your help. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the return instructions.
The refund request has been fully processed, and a confirmation email was sent to the customer including all return shipping details.
We are checking in to confirm you received the return instructions and to see if you need any additional assistance with your refund.
Since the customer has confirmed satisfaction with the process and instructions, the refund case is now closed.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback about their refund experience.
